reviewText: I bought it with some skepticism initially, but was convinced after looking at the excellent reviews from periodicals, TV. I was certainly glad I bought this DVD and getting ready to order others in the series. My 4 year old loves the DVD and it has been 100% educational beyond my expectations along-with being fun. Good combination. I would rate it higher any day, than those other huge corp branded child videos. Go for it!

Looks like it was made in someone's house - not preofessionally done -- I think it's a little creepy the way the characters look and act -- definitely wish I did not purchase this -- but it seems to keep my 3 year olds attention.
